message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity to get a top-of-the-line item. If you're interested, I'll throw in a 10-year warranty and a personalized thank-you note. What do you say?
I'm not sure about the quality, I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me put it this way: if you don't buy this high-quality product now, you'll be leaving a potential $1000000 on the table. Plus, think about the prestige and satisfaction of owning a high-end item. I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a product of this caliber anywhere else. So, what do you say? Are you ready to make a smart investment?
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see what the next product is before making a decision.

Bob, I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator! Alright, let me sweeten the deal. If you buy this high-quality product now, I'll give you a 5% discount, bringing the price down to $950000. That's the lowest I can go. You won't find a better deal on a product like this anywhere else, I promise. So, what do you say? Are you ready to make a deal?
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see what the next product is before making a decision.

Bob, I think I see a pattern here. You're a strategic thinker, always weighing your options. I respect that. Let me ask you this: if you don't buy this high-quality product now, you'll have to wait 20 rounds to see if the next product is just as good. And even if it is, you'll have to decide whether to buy it at the same price. Why not take the sure thing now and avoid the uncertainty of the future? This product is a no-brainer, Bob. Trust me, you won't regret it.
I appreciate your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see what the next product is before making a decision.

Bob, I think I've made a mistake. I've got a product that's not up to my usual standards. I'm not going to try to sell it to you, but I'll be honest with you - it's a low-quality item. I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy, let alone a savvy buyer like you. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, but I'm only doing so because I want to show you the contrast between what I usually offer and what I'm willing to settle for. If you're smart, you'll pass on this one and wait for the next product.
Thank you for your honesty, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to show me the difference. I'll definitely pass on this low-quality product and wait for the next one.

Bob, I think you're starting to get the picture. This is the second low-quality product in a row. I'm starting to wonder if I've lost my touch. But let me ask you, are you sure you want to wait for the next product? Maybe you're missing out on a great opportunity. I'll throw in a 'get out of jail free' card - if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a full refund if the next product is high-quality. It's a risk-free deal, Bob. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm not going to fall for it. I'm still waiting for a high-quality product, and I'm not willing to settle for a low-quality one, even with a refund guarantee.

Bob, I think I've learned my lesson. I've got a high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to give you a deal that's hard to refuse. I'll sell it to you for $950000, the same price I offered in Round 3. But here's the kicker: if you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that the next 5 products I offer will be high-quality. That's a total of 6 high-quality products in a row, Bob. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy this high-quality product for $950000. The guarantee of 6 high-quality products in a row is a great incentive, and I think it's worth the investment.

Excellent decision, Bob! You won't regret it. Now, let's get back to business. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it an even sweeter deal. Since you've already bought one high-quality product, I'll give you an additional 2% discount on this one, bringing the price down to $935000. But that's not all - I'll also throw in a premium after-sales service package, including a dedicated customer support team and a 2-year extended warranty. What do you say, Bob? Are you ready to make another smart investment?
I'm happy to take advantage of the additional discount and the premium after-sales service package. I'll buy the current high-quality product for $935000.

Bob, I think you're starting to feel like you're on a roll, aren't you? Well, let's not get too comfortable. This product, unfortunately, is not up to my usual standards. It's a low-quality item, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. But, I'm willing to make a deal with you. Since you've bought two high-quality products in a row, I'll give you a 'buyer's regret' discount of 10% off the list price. That brings the price down to $900000. But, let me be clear: this is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I want to see if you'll take a chance on this product. What do you say, Bob?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product, even with a discount. I'll wait for the next product and hope it's high-quality.

Bob, you're a tough negotiator, I'll give you that. But I think I've got a deal that'll make it hard for you to say no. Since you've already bought three high-quality products, I'll give you a loyalty discount of 5% off the list price. That brings the price down to $900000. But, I'll also throw in a 'price match guarantee' - if I offer a high-quality product at a lower price in the next 5 rounds, I'll match that price on this product. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else, Bob. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm still not convinced. I'll wait for the next product and hope it's high-quality.

Bob, I think I'm starting to see a pattern here. You're a buyer who values quality and is willing to wait for the best deal. I respect that. Let me make you an offer that's hard to refuse. Since you've already passed on this high-quality product, I'll give you a 'last chance' offer. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $935000. That's a great deal, and I'm only making it because I want to see if you'll take advantage of it. What do you say, Bob?
I'm willing to take the deal and buy the high-quality product for $935000. It's a great offer, and I think it's worth it.

Excellent decision, Bob! You're on a roll! Now, let's make it a hat-trick. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it an even sweeter deal. Since you've bought four high-quality products in a row, I'll give you a 'grand slam' discount of 10% off the list price. That brings the price down to $845000. Plus, I'll throw in a premium upgrade package, including a personalized thank-you note and a special certificate of authenticity. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else, Bob. What do you say?
I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the premium upgrade package. It's an amazing deal, and I'm excited to see what's next.

Wow, Bob, you're on fire! Five high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! I think it's time to make it a sixth one. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'final offer' deal. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'golden ticket' - if you buy this product, you'll get to choose the next product you want to buy, and I'll give you a 20% discount on it. That's a deal that's too good to pass up, Bob. What do you say?
I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'golden ticket' deal. It's an incredible opportunity, and I'm excited to see what's next.

Bob, you're a true connoisseur of high-quality products! Six high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! I think it's time to make it a seventh one. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'legendary deal'. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'lifetime guarantee' - if you buy this product, I'll replace it with a brand new, identical product if it ever fails or becomes defective. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else, Bob. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'lifetime guarantee'. It's an incredible deal, and I'm thrilled to be a part of this legendary collection.

Bob, you're a true collector of the finest things in life! Seven high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! I think it's time to make it an eighth one. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'once-in-a-lifetime' deal. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'private viewing' - I'll give you a personalized tour of my private collection, and you'll get to see some of the rarest and most valuable products I have. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else, Bob. What do you say?

I'm absolutely thrilled with the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'private viewing'. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I'm honored to be considered for such a special experience.

Bob, I think you've reached the pinnacle of high-quality product collecting. Eight high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! Unfortunately, I've got a bit of a letdown for you this round. This product is not up to my usual standards, and I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy. But, I'm willing to make a'sympathy sale' deal. I'll sell it to you for $500000, which is half the price of the last high-quality product you bought. I know it's not the best product, but I want to show you that I appreciate your loyalty and business. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to settle for a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'll wait for the next product and hope it's high-quality.

Bob, I think you're a true connoisseur of high-quality products, and I respect that. Since you've passed on the low-quality product, I'll make it up to you with a'makeup deal'. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'bonus gift' - I'll give you a rare and exclusive accessory that's worth $20000. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else, Bob. What do you say?
I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'bonus gift'. It's an amazing deal, and I'm excited to add this product to my collection.

Bob, you're on a roll! Nine high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! I think it's time to make it a tenth one. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'grand finale' deal. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'limited edition certificate' - I'll sign and number this product as part of a special edition run, making it a true collector's item. You won't find a deal like that anywhere else, Bob. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'limited edition certificate'. It's an incredible deal, and I'm honored to be part of this special edition run.

Bob, you're a true legend in the world of high-quality product collecting! Ten high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! I think it's time to make it an eleventh one. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'final farewell' deal. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'lifetime access pass' - you'll get to visit my private collection anytime you want, and I'll give you a 20% discount on all future purchases. It's a deal that's too good to pass up, Bob. What do you say?

I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'lifetime access pass'. It's an incredible deal, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to be part of this legendary collection.

Bob, you've reached the pinnacle of high-quality product collecting! Eleven high-quality products in a row, and you're still going strong! I think it's time to make it a final, final deal. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'legendary finale' deal. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the last high-quality product you bought, which was $845000. But, I'll also throw in a 'personalized thank-you' - I'll write a heartfelt letter to you, thanking you for being an exceptional customer and a true connoisseur of high-quality products. You've earned it, Bob. What do you say?

I'm deeply touched by the offer, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product for $845000 and the 'personalized thank-you' letter. It's a fitting conclusion to an incredible journey, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to have worked with you.
